title: School of Code
subTitle: Dates: March 2023 - Present
Mentoring students while they are on the course
body: I am a voluntary mentor for the current boot campers. I help them on their journey to become software engineers.

title: Duke of Edinburgh Leader
subTitle: Dates: July 2011 to December 2016
Leading the Bronze and Silver course
body: I helped student gain their Bronze and Silver DoE qualifications including leading several group expeditions.

title: Nottinghamshire Police
subTitle: Dates: February 2009 to June 2019
Position: Special Police Inspector
body: I perform a wide variety of duties such as enforcement of laws and the prevention of crimes, controls traffic flow and enforces state and local traffic regulations, participate in and conducts a variety of criminal investigations, arrests, support and assistance to special crime prevention and law enforcement programs and a variety of technical and administrative tasks in support of law enforcement services and activities.
